channel.title: Community on Open Cluster Management
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Open Cluster Management

item.title: Releases
item.description: Open Cluster Management has approximately a three to four month release cycle. The current release is v0.12.0. Continue reading to view upcoming releases: 0.12.0, 11 Oct. 2023 The Open Cluster Management team is proud to announce the release of OCM v0.12.0! We have made architecture refactors and added several features in this release: Component consolidation: we made a big code refactor to merge code in registration, work, placement and registration-operator into the ocm repo.

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: The Open Cluster Management community uses GitHub Project to track the progress of the project.
